Details:
* **Type**: boolean
* **Possible values**: ``true`` or ``false``
* **Default value**: ``false``
* Denotes if Kubernetes HA will be created ir not. Set the value to ``true`` to create the Kubernetes HA.

* **Type**: string
* This is a mandatory when ``k8s_enable_ha`` is true. 
* This is an user-configurable parameter.
* Captures the IP address of the active OIM node.

* **Type**: string
* External loadbalancer IP (separate from ``virtual_ip_address``).
* This parameter is mandatory if you want to use an external loadbalancer.
* **Default value**: empty

* **Type**: string
* Mandatory if ``external_loadbalancer_ip`` is specified.
* To avoid port conflicts , expose the load-balanced API-servers through the standard port (6443) and configure external loadbalancer to a different port.
